txt.en: Many dark and evil things dwell in the southern forests of Mirkwood. Among those are the black wolves.

'Hail, [placeholder]! Please stay and speak with me. While my companions fret over the strange happenings in Burg√ªl-stazg, my forays into the western Dourstocks have discovered more threats, and no less dangerous in my opinion.

'One of these threats is the black wolves. These beasts are vicious and unpredictable. I have also seen a great wolf, which I have named Blackmaw. His lair lies some distance to the south-east of here at the Packhowler's Hill.

'I bid you go forth and defeat as many of the wolves as you can and lay low Blackmaw.'

Black wolves can be found throughout the Dourstocks. Blackmaw can be found at the Packhowler's Hill, some distance to the south-east from Echad Mothelen.\n\nLavanferon has asked you to defeat many wolves and their pack-leader, Blackmaw.
'It is well, [placeholder], that you have returned victorious. Such evil cannot be allowed to persist in this place which was once the fair Greenwood.'
Lavanferon is at Echad Mothelen, some distance north-west from the Packhowler's Hill.\n\nYou should return to Lavanferon with news of your success.
'Blackmaw and his pack have been terrorizing the flanks of our host. They must be defeated!'
Defeat Blackmaw at the Packhowler's Hill
Talk to Lavanferon at Echad Mothelen
